amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete certain language in the bill providing flexibility to the President in designing HIV/AIDS programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore the President's emergency plan for AIDS relief authorization provision requiring 33% of HIV/AIDS prevention funding to be spent on abstinence and fidelity promotion program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 226 (Roll no. 532).
